item.description:
This popular dance craze is an intense cardio workout class that keeps your body moving with Samba, Tango, Cha Cha, and many other authentic Latin moves. Ask anyone who's taken one of these classes before... it's a great workout and you'll leave sweating and laughing at the same time!

At Bridget's Dance Studio you won't have to deal with the overcrowded gym floor or expensive membership fees. Just sign up at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com the day before you'd like to take a class. New Year special $7 a class or get one free with a ten pack for only $60!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: ZUMBA!
